TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapHeader extends System.Object

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，表示 SOAP 标头的内容。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the content of a SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 标头提供一种方法并传递数据到和从 XML Web 服务方法，如果数据不直接与 XML Web 服务方法的主要功能。SOAP headers offer a method for passing data to and from an XML Web service method if the data is not directly related to the XML Web service method's primary functionality. 例如，XML Web 服务可能包含多个 XML Web 服务方法，每个需要自定义身份验证方案。For instance, an XML Web service might contain several XML Web service methods that each require a custom authentication scheme. 而不是将参数添加到自定义身份验证方案中，每个 XML Web 服务方法，用于从派生的类引用，可以应用于每个 XML Web 服务方法。Instead of adding parameters to each XML Web service method for the custom authentication scheme, a , referring to a class deriving from , can be applied to each XML Web service method. 从派生类实现处理的自定义身份验证方案。The implementation for the class deriving from handles the custom authentication scheme. 以这种方式，XML Web 服务方法实现仅特定于它的功能，并添加了使用 SOAP 标头的其他功能。In this manner, the XML Web service method implements only the functionality specific to it and adds additional functionality using a SOAP header. 下面的列表概述的基本步骤为接收和处理 SOAP 标头：The following list outlines the basic steps to receiving and processing a SOAP header: 1. 创建派生一个类表示的数据传递到 SOAP 标头。Create a class that derives from representing the data passed into the SOAP header. 2. 将成员添加到实现 XML Web 服务的类或 XML Web 服务客户端代理类，第一步中创建的类型。Add a member to the class implementing an XML Web service or an XML Web service client proxy class, of the type created in the first step. 3. 将应用到 XML Web 服务方法或代理类中的相应方法，指定该成员的第二步中创建属性。Apply a to the XML Web service method or the corresponding method in the proxy class, specifying the member created in the second step in the property. 4. 在 XML Web 服务方法或 XML Web 服务客户端代码中，访问属性来处理 SOAP 标头中发送的数据。Within the XML Web service method or XML Web service client code, access the property to process the data sent in the SOAP header. ## Examples 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义`MyHeader`SOAP 标头并要求它为任何调用一起发送`MyWebMethod`XML Web 服务方法。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`而不接收任何 SOAP 标头`MyHeader`SOAP 标头。Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Actor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Actor : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 标头的接收者。

span.span: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.
The recipient of the SOAP header.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置 SOAP 标头的收件人，设置属性。To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the property. 而不考虑用于与 XML Web 服务进行通信的 SOAP 协议版本，.NET Framework 自动生成特定于版本的 SOAP 协议的 SOAP 消息。Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol. 具体而言，XML 元素和表示接收方的 XML 命名空间不同的两个版本。Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions. XML Web 服务接收的 SOAP 标头可以获取的目标接收方通过获取任一或属性。XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the or properties. 为收件人`Body`元素和每个 SOAP 标头内`Header`SOAP 消息的元素不需要相同。The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same. 如果`Header`SOAP 消息中存在的元素，它表示可发往和来自 XML Web 服务方法或中介的其他数据。If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary. 该数据，称为 SOAP 接收方`Actor`在版本 1.1 中，可以是不同于 XML Web 服务方法的 URI 的 URI。The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method. 有关详细信息 SOAP`actor`属性，请参阅在 SOAP 规范http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/. ## Examples 下面的 XML Web 服务客户端调用`MyWebMethod`XML Web 服务方法之后创建的类型的自定义 SOAP 标头`MyHeader`并设置属性设置为`http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`。The following XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method after creating a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader` and setting the property to `http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DidUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DidUnderstand : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 XML Web services 方法是否已正确处理 SOAP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an XML Web service method properly processed a SOAP header.

value.span: 如果已正确处理 SOAP 标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the SOAP header was properly processed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 XML Web 服务定义的 SOAP 标头，ASP.NET 假定 XML Web 服务方法正确处理 SOAP 标头的设置的初始值到`true`。For SOAP headers defined by an XML Web service, ASP.NET assumes the XML Web service method properly processed the SOAP header by setting the initial value of to `true`. 初始值是不由 XML Web 服务定义的 SOAP 标头， `false`。For SOAP headers not defined by the XML Web service, the initial value is `false`. 如果 ASP.NET 检测到 SOAP 标头传递给 XML Web 服务方法与设置为`false`方法返回之后、返回调用而不是结果的 XML Web 服务客户端从 XML Web 服务方法。If ASP.NET detects SOAP headers passed to an XML Web service method with set to `false` after the method returns, a is thrown back to the XML Web service client instead of the results from the XML Web service method. ## Examples 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义`MyHeader`SOAP 标头并要求它为任何调用一起发送`MyWebMethod`XML Web 服务方法。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`而不接收任何 SOAP 标头`MyHeader`SOAP 标头。Additionally, the `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header. 为 SOAP 标头的`MyWebMethod`可以处理设置为`true`。For SOAP headers that `MyWebMethod` can process, is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncodedMustUnderstand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EncodedMustUnderstand : string with get, set

summary.span: 当与 SOAP 协议 1.1 版通信时，获取或设置 SOAP 标头的 XML 特性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.1.
The value of the attribute.
The default is "0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性。Do not use this property. 改为使用属性。Instead use the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/CPP/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/CS/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/VB/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.vb#1)]

exception.span: 属性设置为“0”、“1”、“true”或“false”之外的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".

summary.span: 与 SOAP 协议 1.2 版通信时，获取或设置 SOAP 标头的 XML 属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.2.

value.span: SOAP 标头的 XML 特性的值。

span.span: The value of the XML attribute of a SOAP header.
The default is "0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用此属性。Do not use this property. 改为使用属性。Instead use the property.

exception.span: 属性设置为“0”、“1”、“true”或“false”之外的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncodedRelay { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EncodedRelay : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 1.2 标头的中转特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the relay attribute of the SOAP 1.2 header.
Either "0", "false", "1", or "true".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于 SOAP 1.2，指示是否接收方的消息将转发此标头时它将消息转发到下游的下一个节点。The property applies only to SOAP 1.2 and indicates whether the recipient of the message forwards this header when it forwards the message to the next node downstream. 由于.NET Framework 不支持 SOAP 中介，此属性是序列化和反序列化但被忽略。Because the .NET Framework does not support SOAP intermediaries, this property is serialized and deserialized but ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MustUnderstand : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须理解 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the must be understood.

value.span: 如果 XML Web services 必须正确解释和处理 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the XML Web service must properly interpret and process the ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web 服务客户端将 SOAP 标头添加到使用的 XML Web 服务的方法调用属性设置为`true`，必须设置 XML Web 服务方法属性设置为`true`; 否则为重新引发对由 ASP.NET XML Web 服务客户端。When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the property to `true`; otherwise, a is thrown back to the XML Web service client by ASP.NET. 尽管同时并属性可用于设置的值`mustUnderstand`SOAP 标头中的属性与属性可以设置使用一个布尔值的属性。Although both the and properties can be used to set the value of the `mustUnderstand` attribute within the SOAP header, the property allows you to set the attribute using a Boolean value. 将 SOAP 标头添加到客户端的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba)。For details on adding SOAP headers to clients, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba). ## Examples 下面的 XML Web 服务客户端定义的类型的自定义 SOAP 标头`MyHeader`，设置属性设置为`true`，并调用`MyWebMethod`XML Web 服务方法。The following XML Web service client defines a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader`, sets the property to `true`, and invokes the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 如果 XML Web 服务方法不会设置的属性`MyHeader`SOAP 标头`true`、引发。If the XML Web service method does not set the property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a is thrown. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Relay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Relay : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前节点不理解 SOAP 标头时是否将该标头中转到下一个 SOAP 节点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the SOAP header is to be relayed to the next SOAP node if the current node does not understand the header.

value.span: 如果 SOAP 标头的某个“relay”特性设置为“true”，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the SOAP header has a "relay" attribute set to "true"; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 SOAP 1.2 的处理规则需要 SOAP 节点删除然后再将传递到下一个节点的消息不理解的 SOAP 处理节点的标头。The default SOAP 1.2 processing rules require SOAP nodes to remove headers that are not understood by the SOAP processing node before passing the message on to the next node.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Role { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Role : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 标头的接收者。

span.span: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.

value.span: 一个 URI，表示 SOAP 标头的接收者。

span.span: A URI that represents the recipient of the SOAP header.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置 SOAP 标头的收件人，设置属性。To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the property. 而不考虑用于与 XML Web 服务进行通信的 SOAP 协议版本，.NET Framework 自动生成特定于版本的 SOAP 协议的 SOAP 消息。Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol. 具体而言，XML 元素和表示接收方的 XML 命名空间不同的两个版本。Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions. XML Web 服务接收的 SOAP 标头可以获取的目标接收方通过获取任一或属性。XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the or properties. 为收件人`Body`元素和每个 SOAP 标头内`Header`SOAP 消息的元素不需要相同。The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same. 如果`Header`SOAP 消息中存在的元素，它表示可发往和来自 XML Web 服务方法或中介的其他数据。If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary. 该数据，称为 SOAP 接收方`Role`中的 SOAP 规范和 SOAP 1.2 版`Actor`在版本 1.1 中，可以是不同于 XML Web 服务方法的 URI 的 URI。The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Role` in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification and the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method. 有关详细信息 SOAP`actor`属性，请参阅在 SOAP 规范http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/.
